sentence.Network_en: It was very small, very dark, very ugly, very incommodious.

list.abs: objective To probe into the surgical operation method of restoring incommodious bile duct by gallbladder one ( lamella ) with cystic artery .目的探讨用带胆囊动脉的胆囊瓣修复胆管狭窄的手术方法。
